summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for Jeffrey Epstein's account at Deutsche Bank for the month of February 2016. It details various debits, credits, and service charges, providing insight into Epstein's financial activities during this period.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the primary individual associated with the account detailed in this financial record, showing his transactions and account balance.

persons.name: Tony McCorquodale
persons.context: Tony McCorquodale is mentioned as a beneficiary in transactions involving outgoing money from Epstein's account.

connections.description: Epstein made several transactions to Tony McCorquodale's account, indicating a financial relationship.

events.title: Account Summary for February 2016
events.description: The document provides a detailed summary of Jeffrey Epstein's account transactions for February 2016, including deposits, withdrawals, and service charges.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, St. Thomas, US Virgin Islands
keyFacts: The account balance at the beginning of February 2016 was $257,301.69.
Significant debits included payments to Oxford Health and various preauthorized debits.
Multiple transactions were made to Tony McCorquodale's account, indicating a financial relationship.
The ending balance as of February 29, 2016, was $169,126.81.
There were no overdraft fees charged during this statement period.
